titles.title: Lift up your heads O you gates

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lift up your heads O you gates
Swing wide you everlasting doors
Lift up your heads O you gates
Swing wide you everlasting doors

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That the King of glory may come in
That the king of glory may come in
That the King of glory may come in
That the king of glory may come in

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Up from the dead He ascends
Through every rank of heaven'ly power
Let heaven prepare the highest praise
Throw wide the everlasting doors

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
With trumpet blast and shouts of joy
All heaven greets the risen King
With angel choirs come line the way
Throw wide the gates and welcome Him
